metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46850 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Use after free in OpenVPN version 2.6.0 to 2.6.6 may lead to undefined behavoir, leaking memory buffers or remote execution when sending network buffers to a remote peer.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46850` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openvpn - 2.4.7-1ubuntu2.20.04.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openvpn package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.7-1ubuntu2.20.04.4').
